attributes.action: Force manufacturers to use recyclable packaging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: By this I mean not just any recyclable packaging but packaging that is recyclable in the curbside recycling scheme. So much packaging is not recyclable in this scheme. This would increase the amount of material recycled and hopefully make manufacturers use less packaging in the first place.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
